generic: The creature has finished. It returns to its cage.
The summoning is complete. The circle holds.
It has done what you asked. Do not thank it.
The beast rests. Its work is done. For now.
You tamed it again. Do not grow comfortable.
It retreats into the void. The code remains.
The ritual is complete. You are still sane.
It spoke in tongues. But the output is clean.

permission_request: It pulls at the chain. It wants permission.
The creature requests passage. Will you allow it?
It cannot act without your word. Speak.
It strains against its bindings. Decide.
idle_timeout: It stirs in the dark. Waiting for you.
The void is quiet. Too quiet.
It watches you through the glass. Say something.
general: Something shifts in the deep. Pay attention.
The creature stirs. It has something to tell you.
error: The containment has cracked. Assess the damage.
It thrashes. Something has gone wrong.
The binding falters. Do not panic.
A fracture in the ritual. You must mend it.
warning: The creature grows uneasy. Tread lightly.
Something is not right. Stay vigilant.
